body: Hi Devang, I get a look at your file and ... it is working for me as is. [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/KZdONCIBf2Ch3eJPqYM1VaYyZ-0mdQgCJWA7gpTMGelJBVmr2-mbd6Bo99HHNM46fIrKtY8XffO1om-VJ35V*XVFB1i4wE9L/Capture.JPG)Though a needed to set the path for LB_LB and HB_HB. Since to be that the last update force that the default is now at the .../Roaming/... location and not also at C:\Ladybug (as both of them were allowed before). After that it worked fine. I would check, anyways, also the tolerance of Rhino (mine is 0.001). Not sure this can be, but please check. If nothing of this helps, test the component to identify the code line where the error is happenning. This can be helpful for debuging. Attached the file that i "touched". -A.
